sentences.english: I want to have them sunnyside up.
sentences.chinese: 我要蛋黄在上面的煎蛋。

sentences.english: Harry was frying eggs by the time Dudley arrived in the kitchen with his mother.
sentences.chinese: 哈利正在煎蛋的时候，达力和他母亲一起来到厨房。

sentences.english: It all comes down to a fried-egg sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 这与煎蛋三明治有很大关系。

sentences.english: Omelette or you can sprinkle in some pepper, fine salt.
sentences.chinese: 在煎蛋时或可以洒些胡椒粉，细盐。

sentences.english: How about an omelette, or something?
sentences.chinese: 吃点煎蛋卷还是吃点别的？

sentences.english: Fried only on one side. Used of eggs.
sentences.chinese: 煎蛋，但只煎一面，生的那面像太阳一样朝上。

sentences.english: Eggs is the basic ingredient to many dishes, like omelet and french toast.
sentences.chinese: 鸡蛋是最基本的要素很多菜，喜欢煎蛋和法式面包。

sentences.english: Theyare sweet and sour pork, almond junket, shrimp omelet and Chickeninsweet and sour sauce.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉点了糖醋排骨，杏仁豆腐，虾仁煎蛋和糖醋鸡块。

sentences.english: Using rubber spatula, loosen edges of frittata and slide out onto platter.
sentences.chinese: 用橡胶平铲铲松煎蛋饼边缘并移至盘中。

sentences.english: Now that egg would make an enormous omelette.
sentences.chinese: 现在这颗蛋可以做一个巨大的煎蛋卷。

sentences.english: DO you like your egg soft-boiled hard-boiled or fried?
sentences.chinese: 你要煮嫩蛋，老蛋还是煎蛋？

sentences.english: The mushroom omelet appealed to itself.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇煎蛋卷只为自己付帐。

sentences.english: Sit down. How about an omelette, or something?
sentences.chinese: 坐下，吃点煎蛋卷还是吃点别的好吗？

sentences.english: He cooked us all a big breakfast of bacon and fried eggs.
sentences.chinese: 他为我们每人做了一份有熏咸肉和煎蛋的丰盛早餐。

sentences.english: My wife likes mushroom omelet and I want fried eggs sunny side up.
sentences.chinese: 我太太喜欢蘑菇蛋卷，我要单面煎蛋。

sentences.english: Bacon and fried eggs, toast and butter, coffee or tea.
sentences.chinese: 培根加煎蛋，烤面包加黄油，还有咖啡或者茶。

definition: poached egg/egg fried on both sides
